body_html: One other thing I realized: we don't actually need an ExitWorld node, since the AnnotateEffects pass tracks the last used token at all times anyway. I plan to remove it unless people want to keep around for some future purpose (do we ever call entire graphs from other graphs without inlining?).

body: One other thing I realized: we don't actually need an `ExitWorld` node, since the AnnotateEffects pass tracks the last used token at all times anyway. I plan to remove it unless people want to keep around for some future purpose (do we ever call entire graphs from other graphs without inlining?).
